data.eml:eml: Opistognathus albicaudatus, a new species of jawfish (Teleostei: Opistognathidae) from the Andaman Islands

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smith-Vaniz, William F. (2011): Opistognathus albicaudatus, a new species of jawfish (Teleostei: Opistognathidae) from the Andaman Islands. Zootaxa 3085: 34-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202664
